items.name: Placehold

items.about: Japanese-language placeholder service for PNG images. Uses simple URL patterns like /WIDTHxHEIGHT.png

items.name: WAVE
items.about: Web Accessibility Evaluation Tool that visualizes accessibility issues directly on web pages. Checks for ARIA labels, contrast errors, and missing alt text.

items.name: A11y Color Contrast Checker
items.about: Validates color contrast ratios (WCAG 2.1/3.0) for text and background combinations. Provides pass/fail status for accessibility compliance.

items.name: Lighthouse
items.about: Open-source auditing tool for performance, SEO, accessibility, and best practices. Integrated into Chrome DevTools.

items.name: CSS Minifier
items.about: Compresses CSS files by removing whitespace and comments. Reduces file size for faster page loads.

items.name: JSCompress
items.about: JavaScript minifier using UglifyJS 3. Optimizes code for production by stripping unnecessary characters.

items.name: TinyPNG
items.about: Compresses PNG and JPEG images using smart lossy compression. Reduces file size without noticeable quality loss.

items.name: ImageOptim
items.about: Desktop and API tool for optimizing images (PNG, JPEG, GIF). Removes metadata and applies compression.

items.name: GTmetrix
items.about: Analyzes website speed using Lighthouse and PageSpeed Insights. Provides actionable recommendations.

items.name: PageSpeed Insights
items.about: Measures page performance on mobile and desktop. Suggests fixes for slow-loading resources.

items.name: WebPageTest
items.about: Advanced performance testing with global test locations, custom scripts, and filmstrip views.

items.name: Pingdom
items.about: Website speed test tool with waterfall analysis and performance grading.

items.name: axe DevTools
items.about: Browser extension for automated accessibility testing. Integrates with Chrome and Firefox.

items.name: Pa11y
items.about: Automated accessibility testing CLI and dashboard. Scans pages for WCAG compliance.

items.name: Accessibility Insights
items.about: Microsoft's suite for identifying accessibility issues (FastPass, Assessment, and Ad hoc tools).

items.name: Color Safe
items.about: Generates WCAG-compliant color palettes based on background hue and text size.

items.name: Stark
items.about: Design plugin (Figma/Sketch) for checking contrast, simulating color blindness, and alt text tagging.

items.name: Tenon
items.about: API-driven accessibility testing tool with integrations for CI/CD pipelines.

items.name: AChecker
items.about: Web accessibility checker supporting WCAG 2.0/2.1 and Section 508 standards.

items.name: HTML_CodeSniffer
items.about: Bookmarklet for checking HTML accessibility against WCAG guidelines.

items.name: Silktide
items.about: Simulates how users with disabilities experience your site. Offers automated audits.

items.name: NoCoffee Vision Simulator
items.about: Chrome extension simulating visual impairments (blur, cataracts, color blindness).

items.name: WebAIM Contrast Checker
items.about: Advanced contrast ratio checker with luminosity and brightness analysis.

items.name: PurifyCSS
items.about: Removes unused CSS to reduce file size. Integrates with build tools like Webpack.

items.name: Critical
items.about: Extracts and inlines critical CSS for above-the-fold content to improve load times.

items.name: SVGO
items.about: SVG optimizer with granular control over compression settings (plugins, precision).

items.name: Brotli Compression Tester
items.about: Checks if Brotli compression is enabled on your server for faster asset delivery.

items.name: HTTP/3 Check
items.about: Verifies HTTP/3 (QUIC) support for modern protocol performance benefits.

items.name: Cloudinary
items.about: Image and video optimization CDN with auto-format, resizing, and lazy loading.

items.name: Squoosh
items.about: Open-source image compression tool by Google. Supports WebP, AVIF, and MozJPEG.

items.name: PurgeCSS
items.about: Removes unused CSS classes from frameworks like Bootstrap or Tailwind.

items.name: Calibre
items.about: Performance monitoring with synthetic testing, real-user metrics, and regression alerts.

items.name: SpeedCurve
items.about: RUM and synthetic monitoring with Core Web Vitals tracking and competitor benchmarking.

items.name: Webpack Bundle Analyzer
items.about: Visualizes JavaScript bundle sizes to identify optimization opportunities.

items.name: SEO Tester
items.about: Audits meta tags, headings, and structured data for SEO optimization.

items.name: Varvy
items.about: Checks SEO, mobile readiness, and page speed with actionable reports.

items.name: SEMrush Site Audit
items.about: Comprehensive SEO audit tool for technical issues, backlinks, and content gaps.

items.name: Moz Link Explorer
items.about: Analyzes backlink profiles and domain authority for SEO optimization.

items.name: Ahrefs Site Audit
items.about: Crawls websites for SEO issues like broken links, duplicate content, and slow pages.

items.name: YellowLabTools
items.about: Front-end performance profiler identifying JavaScript bottlenecks and CSS complexity.

items.name: DNS Checker
items.about: Global DNS propagation tester to ensure fast, reliable domain resolution.

items.name: Security Headers
items.about: Analyzes HTTP headers for security best practices (CSP, HSTS, X-Content-Type).

items.name: SSL Labs Test
items.about: Checks SSL/TLS configuration for vulnerabilities and protocol support.

items.name: Can I Use
items.about: Browser support tables for CSS, JavaScript, and HTML5 features.

items.name: Bundlephobia
items.about: Analyzes npm package sizes to avoid bloated dependencies.

items.name: The A11Y Project
items.about: Community-driven resource with checklists, patterns, and guides for accessibility.

items.name: Hemingway App
items.about: Improves content readability by highlighting complex sentences and passive voice.

items.name: Readable
items.about: Analyzes text readability scores (Flesch-Kincaid) for inclusive content.

items.name: WP Accessibility
items.about: WordPress plugin adding skip links, ARIA roles, and contrast fixes.

items.name: Deque University
items.about: Training platform for web accessibility standards (WCAG, ARIA).

items.name: UserWay
items.about: Accessibility widget offering adjustments like text scaling, contrast toggles, and keyboard navigation.

items.name: AMP Validator
items.about: Validates Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) for performance and compliance.

items.name: New Relic
items.about: Full-stack observability platform for monitoring application performance and errors.

items.name: Checkbot
items.about: Chrome extension auditing SEO, speed, and security during website crawls.

items.name: Sitespeed.io
items.about: Open-source tool for measuring performance metrics and generating HAR files.

items.name: PerfBuddy
items.about: Quick performance audits with actionable insights for developers.
